Articles.Content:
Hello fellow kerbolnauts,

I have been trying to use BDArmoury in my ksp game, but every time I start it up, it stops at the Vulcan turret or something of the like. I cannot figure out what the issue is. I am using the right version. I will be thankful for any help that I can get.

Moved to Tech support, Modded.

Your best bet would be to post in the Appropriate Mod thread, and then provide the required info (mod list, logs, etc) as per the thread, to get the answers you seek.
